description: An examination of the law, international conventions, and policy considerations that regulate the management and exploitation of offshore energy. The course deals primarily with oil and gas; it does not cover fisheries.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
